name: Vortex Mod Manager
content:
files:
- setup: https://github.com/Nexus-Mods/Vortex/releases/download/v1.0.0/vortex-setup-1.0.0.exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Black Tree Gaming Ltd/Vortex/Vortex.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet46 arial
    name: winetricks
- task:
    key: Decorated
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: N
- task:
    args: /S
    exclude_processes: Vortex.exe
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  version: lutris-4.13-x86_64
